hero.title: Student in Networks & Telecommunications
hero.description:
Currently a student in BUT Networks and Telecommunications, I am passionate about the world of computer networks and especially cybersecurity. Naturally curious and always looking for new challenges, I chose to orient my career towards this evolving field.

It was during my studies that cybersecurity became an obvious choice. In an increasingly connected world, ensuring the protection of systems and data is a crucial challenge. I want to contribute to this mission by developing solutions that are ever safer, more efficient, and adapted to current threats.

I love to learn, experiment, and create. Whether through personal projects or in a professional setting, I enjoy putting my skills into practice and continuously progressing.

If you would like to know more about me or contact me, feel free to explore this site... or download my CV!
